channel.title: wrt54g custom vx image
channel.description:
So I am using this tutorial to turn my wrt54g router into a client bridge: [url='https://www.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/Linksys_WRT54G_v5.0_%26_5.1_%26_6.0']DD-wrt wiki[/url].
It stresses how important it is to create a custom vx image for your router, but it doesn't tell you what the fuck one is or how to create it. :fffuuu: I couldnt find any info googling.
How do I create this custom vx image?? BTW I'm using a version 5 wrt54g.

item.title: wrt54g custom vx image
item.dc:creator: garrthbarrttinn
item.description:
wheybags:

You linked to a tutorial describing what you need…

oh fuck I guess I’m a dumbass. When I saw the image thing I thought it wanted me to create and image and use it in the program, but it turned out the program was what was creating the image. :s elffacepalm:

Read full topic
